description: Generate targets from WSUS SQL Server

host.description: Hostname/IP of the WSUS SQL Server database.

port.description: Port to connect to the database on. Default = 1433

database.description: Name of the WSUS database. Default = SUSDB

username.description: Username for authentication to the database.

password.description: Password for authentication to the database.

group.description: Return only computers that are a member of this WSUS group.

filter_older_than_days.description: Filters out hosts that haven't reported in within the last N days. This uses the LastReportedStatusTime property on the ComputerTarget object to compare against.

ignore_dns_hostnames.description: Array of computer DNS Hostnames to ignore. These hosts will be excluded from the results
